document.full_text: it is difficult to imagine a more extreme turnabout in the acceptance of women than at texas a&m, which didn't admit them as full students until 1963.
document.title: n.c.a.a. tournament: final four | on basketball: at texas a&m, a long journey to the final four
lines_and_colors: it is difficult to imagine a more extreme turnabout in the acceptance of women than at texas a&m, which didn't admit them as full students until 1963.
